edu.holycross.shot.nysi
[Groovy] Class ImgTurtleizer

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.nysi.ImgTurtleizer

class ImgTurtleizer

Class for generating RDF statements for the HMT project's CITE Image extension. The ImgTurtleizer uses csv or tsv files to create ImageCollection objects, and can generate RDF statements for each Image Collection.

Property Summary
static java.lang.String prefix

RDF prefix declarations.
java.io.File sourceDir

A group of configurations for one or more Image Collection extensions.

Constructor taking String name of a directory.

void ttl(java.io.File outFile)

Turtleize configuration of all Image Collection extensions, and write resulting TTL, optionally including RDF prefix statements, to outFile.
java.lang.String ttlize()

Creates a String composed of RDF prefix and TTL statements documenting all configured Image Collection extensions found in this turtleizer's source directory.

Creates a String, optionally including RDF prefix statements, composed of TTL statements documenting all configured Image Collection extensions found in this turtleizer's source directory.
java.lang.String ttlizeCollections(ImageService svc)

Creates a String composed of TTL statements documenting all configured Image Collection extensions.

ttl

void ttl(java.io.File outFile, boolean includePrefix)
Turtleize configuration of all Image Collection extensions, and write resulting TTL, optionally including RDF prefix statements, to outFile.
Parameters:
outFile - File where TTL is written.
includePrefix - True if RDF prefix satements should be included.

ttlize

java.lang.String ttlize()
Creates a String composed of RDF prefix and TTL statements documenting all configured Image Collection extensions found in this turtleizer's source directory.
returns:
A multi-line String of TTL.
throws:
Exception if any lines of the configuration files cannot be parsed.

ttlize

java.lang.String ttlize(boolean includePrefix)
Creates a String, optionally including RDF prefix statements, composed of TTL statements documenting all configured Image Collection extensions found in this turtleizer's source directory.
returns:
A multi-line String of TTL.
throws:
Exception if any lines of the configuration files cannot be parsed.
Parameters:
includePrefix - True if RDF prefix statements should be included.

ttlizeCollections

java.lang.String ttlizeCollections(ImageService svc)
Creates a String composed of TTL statements documenting all configured Image Collection extensions.
returns:
A multi-line String of TTL.
throws:
Exception if any lines of the configuration files cannot be parsed.
Parameters:
svc - The ImageService to describe in RDF.
